detail_desc: Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a small opening at the back. High waist, lined gusset and a string back.

Single-breasted jacket in a marled linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and imitation suede elbow patches. Chest pocket, flap front pockets, a fastening with two buttons at the front, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Partly lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Boxy, knitted jumper with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Gloves knitted in a soft cashmere blend with a long, ribbed shaft.
Fitted top in jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Top in patterned jersey with an appliqué, long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a round neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Top in soft jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, a decorative chiffon bow at the top and short puff sleeves.
Cable-knit jumper in a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in jersey.
Gently fitted blouse in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Mittens in a soft knit with a cable-knit section on the uppers and a front flap that can be fastened back with a button to reveal a pair of fingerless gloves. Ribbed, foldover cuffs.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam and wide flounce at the hem.

Set with a vest top and matching shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes. Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print motif on one leg.
Velour slippers with appliqués and soft souls with anti-slip protectors. Polyester lining.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with triangular cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed slightly stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Short dressing gown in satin with a lace yoke at the back and on the shoulders, short, wide sleeves with a lace trim, and a tie belt at the waist.
Short-sleeved nursing top in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated seam and ties at the waist and a wrapover front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake front pockets.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and tapered legs with creases.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Flatlock seams and a high waist with a wide waist panel.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a metal button. Unlined.
Patterned top in crinkled jersey. Flutter sleeves with overlocked edges, and an overlocked hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, round neckline, short sleeves and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Pyjama bottoms in a patterned cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly.
Top in airy slub jersey with short cap sleeves and a gently draped, wrapover back.
Playsuit in sequined, glittery jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps. V-neck at the front, straight cut at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seam and long, wide sleeves with close-fitting cuffs with concealed press-studs. Unlined.
Sleeveless playsuit in airy viscose with a print motif at the top and crossover straps at the back. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
Rib-knit scarf with fringes on the short sides. Size 30x180 cm.
Brazilian briefs in lace and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a V-neck, low-cut back and gently rounded hem.
Cotton canvas espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Suit in a patterned weave. Single-breasted jacket with notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets, an inner pocket and slit at the cuffs. Suit trousers with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket, and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, back pockets and slim legs.
Top in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front, narrow trims around the neckline and short sleeves with turn-ups.
Aviator-style sunglasses with matt plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.

Wrapover blouse in an airy, lightly crinkled weave made from a cotton blend. V-neck, kaftan sleeves with wide flounced trims, a tie belt that can be wrapped around the waist several times, and a straight hem.
Skirt in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front with adjustable buttoning.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a narrow cut at the top and racer back. Relaxed fit.
Boxy polo-neck jumper in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing at cuffs.
Elasticated metal bracelet with coin-shaped links.

Short dress in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Two-button jacket in a cotton and linen weave with notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Welt chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Striped lining.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with short, flounced sleeves and buttons right down the back.
Shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a classic button front, yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short, sleeveless top in a fine knit with wide shoulder straps, a sweetheart neckline and a drawstring down the front to create a draped effect.

Long, padded parka in cotton twill with a drawstring hood and stand-up collar with a press-stud. Zip and button band with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press stud, and a drawstring at the waist. Elasticated cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, cotton knit with a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Velour bracelet with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details and appliqués. Size 3.5x20 cm.
Fitted top in airy jersey with a turtle neck and extra-long sleeves.

Super push-up bra in lace with decorative lace straps at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a high waist and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Thin metal chain necklaces with round pendants. Adjustable length 43-51 cm and 50-58 cm.
Large scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut dress in woven, pleated fabric with a small stand-up collar and discreet zip at the front. Horizontal seams at the top that add texture and movement to the dress. Long sleeves and wide, smooth cuffs with an opening and buttons. Seam at the waist and an airy, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, lightly padded, satin-covered Alice band.
